name: Christmas Shooter (itch) (irpea)
description:
Have you ever wondered if Santa has problems at home? Well, this game shows a sneak peak into Santa's every day, where he and Miss Santa keep their little town clean.

Help Santa and his Miss to get rid of Ice Monsters.


Available on Microsoft Windows 7+ and Android OS 9.0+

Created by: Urban Snake Media

Level Designer: Ivana Jesih Kamber

Game Designer:  Ivana Jesih Kamber

GUI: Ivana Jesih Kamber

Programmer: Mirna Tominac, Nino Potrkač

VFX: Nino Potrkač, Ivo Franković

Music & Sounds: Sonja Hranjec, Vedran Živković

Team Lead: Igor Čulić

Mentor : Dominik "Cwekii" Cvetkovski 

Created during 64h GameJam on 19th of October in Novska, Croatia
